meta.title: Latana's Personal Website
meta.description: This is Latana's personal website. It showcases my projects, skills, and experiences.

header.title: Welcome to my website
header.description: Feel free to look around and get a better feel of who I am.

myProjects.title: My Projects
myProjects.description: Here are some of my latest projects that I have worked on.

gallery.title: Gallery
gallery.description: All the images are real pictures reimagined with the help of ChatGPT. It is a way for me to show my family without exposing my children to the internet since I take their privacy very seriously.

summary.title: Short Summary
summary.text: I graduated in the summer of 2015 from Linnaeus University where I learned object-oriented programming. I have 5 years of experience in the delivery team at Vergic AB where I worked in Javascript and Angular and 3 years of experience in the product team at Puzzel AB where I worked in React Redux.

theory.title: Theoretically
theory.ux: Basic level in UX & web design

other.title: Other Skills
other.languages: I am fluent in Swedish and English.

puzzel.title: 2021 - Present Puzzel AB:
puzzel.text: At Puzzel's product team, I had the opportunity to work in a team where the mission was to build a new web application that would allow the customer to build their own support flow on the web without needing any IT knowledge. The application was built in React Redux. The customer had the option to choose whether they wanted to present a chat, a bubble, or a form, and then choose the order in which it should be presented. We also built a rule engine that the customer could determine when the flow should start. The project has so far taken us 3 years.

vergic.title: 2016 - 2021 Vergic AB:
vergic.text: I worked in Vergic's delivery team where I got to work in JavaScript but also Angular at times when the core of the application needed updating. The task was to work with customers, listen to their problems and requirements, and then deliver a tailored solution that could aesthetically blend into the customer's website. I was also responsible for workshops and training days for customers and the company's partners. This led to me also teaching and being responsible for new developers who joined the delivery team.

education.title: Education
education.linnaeusUniversity: 2012 - 2015, Web Programming (120 credits), Linnaeus University, Kalmar.

personal.title: Personal
personal.text: I am a cheerful, playful, and outgoing person who was born and raised in Trelleborg. In my free time, I spend most of my time with family and socializing with friends. I exercise regularly to keep my body active. I also have an interest in geographical politics as well as Asian economics and culture. I am passionate about discussing and solving problems and find joy in doing a good job, preferably together with others. Furthermore, I am good at handling stress, am patient and social, but perform just as well individually as I do in a group.
